Rice, a versatile and inexpensive source of carbohydrate, is a critical component  of diet worldwide. Climate change, causing extreme weather, poses a threat to  sustained availability of rice. Scientists are working on developing Green Super  Rice (GSR), which is resilient under extreme weather conditions yet gives higher  yields sustainably.   Which one of the following is the CORRECT logical inference based on the  information given in the above passage?
option1: GSR is an alternative to regular rice, but it grows only in an extreme weather
option2: GSR may be used in future in response to adverse effects of climate change
option3: GSR grows in an extreme weather, but the quantity of produce is lesser than  regular rice
option4: Regular rice will continue to provide good yields even in extreme weather                                                                                                                                                        Page 6

question_text: Choose the CORRECT statement(s) from the following on the solution of systems  of linear equations without the application of regularization.
option1: An under-determined system of linearly independent equations has either a trivial  solution or an infinite number of solutions.
option2: An ill-conditioned system of linear equations can yield stable solutions in the  presence of noise.
option3: An over-determined system of linearly independent equations does not have an  exact solution.
option4: A system of linearly independent equations with the number of equations equal to  the number of unknowns is a mixed-determined system.

question_text: In seismic spiking deconvolution with an unknown source wavelet, the wavelet can  be deconvolved most effectively under which of the following condition(s)?
option1: The source wavelet is minimum phase.
option2: The source wavelet is zero phase.
option3: The autocorrelation of the reflectivity series in time domain can be approximated  by a delta function.
option4: The autocorrelation of the reflectivity series in time domain can be approximated  to be identically zero.                    GATE 2022    Geology Geophysics (Geophysics)  Page 30

question_text: The stacking chart for an end-on 2D seismic survey is shown in the figure. The  shot, receiver, mid-point and offset coordinate axes are as indicated in the figure,  while each star represents a unique seismic trace. With reference to the stacking  chart, which of the following is/are CORRECT statement(s)?
option1: The traces along LL constitute a common mid-point (CMP) gather.
option2: The traces along LL constitute a common shot gather.
option3: The traces along NN constitute a common offset gather.
option4: The traces along NN constitute a common receiver gather.
